page.title: 19THE SHOPS OF SHREWTON
page.content: Shrewton is very fortunate in the retail outlets within the village. They are: Central Stores: They offer a good selection of General Foods, Fruit and Vegetables, Cleaning Materials Haber- dashery, Hardware, Medicines etc., Toiletries, Garden Tools, Plants and Flowers, Confectionery and Wines etc. Butcher: All types of meat product including home made sausages. Also a selection of fresh fruit, vegetables, cheese and milk. Post Office: General GPO facilities, plus Greetings Cards, Stationery, Jewellery, Gifts, Confectionery etc. Newsagents: Newspapers, Magazines, Periodicals, Books, Cards, Video Library, Stationery, Wools and Toys. Village Stores: Food items, Cleaning materials, Gifts, Gardening Tools, Hardware and a Video Library.
